statements: SELECT * FROM census_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM census_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM census_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, occupation FROM census_data ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM census_data WHERE occupation LIKE '%Engineer%';
SELECT * FROM census_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, occupation FROM census_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT occupation FROM census_data ORDER BY occupation DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, occupation FROM census_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 35 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, occupation FROM census_data WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT city, state, population FROM census_data;
SELECT * FROM census_data WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT city, state, median_income FROM census_data ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT city, state, age_group, population_count FROM demographics WHERE age_group = '18-30';
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY population_count ASC, city DESC;
SELECT city, state, population FROM census_data WHERE state='California';
SELECT city, population, median_income FROM census_data WHERE population > 500000 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM census_data WHERE city='Los Angeles';
SELECT city, state, population_count FROM demographics INNER JOIN census_data ON demographics.city = census_data.city WHERE demographics.population_count > 10000 ORDER BY census_data.population DESC;
SELECT city, age_group, population_count FROM demographics WHERE age_group='Adults' ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM public.census_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, gender, ethnicity FROM public.census_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT area_id, total_population FROM public.population_stats WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY area_id;
SELECT researcher_name, publication_date FROM public.policy_research WHERE research_topic = 'Education';
SELECT * FROM public.census_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM public.census_data ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, gender, ethnicity FROM public.census_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT study_id, research_topic FROM public.policy_research WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS gender_count FROM public.census_data GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY gender_count DESC;
SELECT area_id, total_population, median_income FROM public.population_stats WHERE unemployment_rate < 5.00 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM census_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, age, city FROM census_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT region_name, population FROM regions WHERE country='USA';
SELECT description FROM policies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, education_level, income FROM demographics ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT name, age, city FROM census_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT education_level, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000
SELECT region_name, population, median_income FROM regions WHERE population > 1000000
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, age_group, family_size FROM demographics WHERE age_group = 'Young Adult'
SELECT * FROM CensusData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, gender, ethnicity FROM CensusData WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT city, population FROM PopulationStats WHERE median_age < 40;
SELECT education_level, graduation_rate FROM EducationStats WHERE enrolled_students > 1000;
SELECT * FROM HousingData WHERE price < 100000;
SELECT * FROM CensusData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, gender, income FROM CensusData WHERE ethnicity='Hispanic';
SELECT city, state, population FROM PopulationStats WHERE median_age > 35;
SELECT occupation, unemployment_rate, employed_count, total_workers FROM EmploymentData WHERE unemployment_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM HousingData WHERE price < 500000 AND bedrooms >= 3;
